makeEmptyChessBoard

public static ChessBoard<ChessPiece> makeEmptyChessBoard()
Makes a chess board. The board will contain appropriate black and white tiles

Returns:
an initialized chess board

makeFullChessBoard

public static ChessBoard<ChessPiece> makeFullChessBoard()
Makes a chess board. The board will have all pieces placed on it for a game of chess. The board will contain appropriate black and white tiles

Returns:
an initialized chess board will all pieces

getMoveLocationsforLoc

public java.util.ArrayList<info.gridworld.grid.Location> getMoveLocationsforLoc(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Returns an array of possible move locations for a piece at a location

Parameters:
loc - the Location to check
Returns:
null if no piece is there, an arrayList of possible move Locations if a piece is there
